bin.cat: Binary for concatenating and displaying file content.
bin.rm: Binary for removing files or directories.
bin.wget: Binary for downloading files from the web.
bin.curl: Binary for transferring data with URLs.

grub.grub.cfg:
# GRUB configuration file
DEFAULT_TIMEOUT=5
DEFAULT_ENTRY="Ubuntu, with Linux 5.15.0-76-generic"

menuentry "Ubuntu, with Linux 5.15.0-76-generic" {
 linux /boot/vmlinuz-5.15.0-76-generic root=UUID=aad9e307-0628-4c7f-b546-a62f8b4b645e ro quiet splash
 initrd /boot/initrd.img-5.15.0-76-generic
}

etc.passwd:
root:x:0:0:root:/root:/bin/bash
daemon:x:1:1:daemon:/usr/sbin:/usr/sbin/nologin
bin:x:2:2:bin:/bin:/usr/sbin/nologin
sys:x:3:3:sys:/dev:/usr/sbin/nologin
honeypot:x:1000:1000:Honeypot User:/home/honeypot:/bin/bash
user1:x:1001:1001:Regular User:/home/user1:/bin/bash
etc.hosts:
127.0.0.1 localhost
127.0.1.1 server01

# The following lines are desirable for IPv6 capable hosts
::1     ip6-localhost ip6-loopback
fe00::0 ip6-localnet

ssh.sshd_config:
# SSH daemon configuration
Port 22
PermitRootLogin no
PasswordAuthentication yes
X11Forwarding no

honeypot..bashrc:
# ~/.bashrc: executed by bash for non-login shells
# see /usr/share/doc/bash/examples/startup-files for examples

alias ls='ls --color=auto'
alias ll='ls -la'
alias grep='grep --color=auto'
honeypot.readme.txt:
Welcome to the server!

This machine is used for development and testing purposes.
Please do not make changes without consulting the admin team.

log.auth.log:
Feb 27 09:23:45 server01 sshd[1234]: Accepted password for honeypot from 192.168.1.10 port 49812 ssh2
Feb 27 14:22:35 server01 sshd[1235]: Accepted password for honeypot from 192.168.1.15 port 51432 ssh2
log.syslog: Feb 27 08:00:01 server01 systemd[1]: Started Daily apt upgrade and clean activities.

dev.null: Special file that discards all data written to it
dev.zero: Special file that provides null characters
dev.random: Special file that provides random data
